mapper.insert:
insert into sys_sample (
id,
name,
weight,
info,
version,
create_time,
) values (
#{id},
#{name},
#{weight},
#{info},
#{version},
#{createTime},
)

id,
name,
weight,
info,
version,
create_time,
) values (
#{id},
#{name},
#{weight},
#{info},
#{version},
#{createTime},
)

insert into sys_sample (
id,
name,
weight,
info,
version,
create_time,
) values (
#{id},
#{name},
#{weight},
#{info},
#{version},
#{createTime},
) on duplicate key update
id=values(id),
name=values(name),
weight=values(weight),
info=values(info),
version=values(version),
create_time=values(create_time),

id, name, weight, info, version, create_time,
) values

on duplicate key update

mapper.update:
update sys_sample set
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
weight = #{weight},
info = #{info},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}

update sys_sample set
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
weight = #{weight},
info = #{info},
create_time = #{createTime},
, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update sys_sample set
id = #{ pojo.id },
name = #{ pojo.name },
weight = #{ pojo.weight },
info = #{ pojo.info },
version = #{ pojo.version },
create_time = #{ pojo.createTime },
where
id = #{ pojo.id }

mapper.delete:
delete from sys_sample where
id in
#{item}
and
id = #{id} and
name in
#{item}
and
name = #{name} and
weight in
#{item}
and
weight = #{weight} and
info in
#{item}
and
info = #{info} and
version in
#{item}
and
version = #{version} and
create_time in
#{item}
and
create_time = #{createTime} and

sql.trim: id as "id", name as "name", weight as "weight", info as "info", version as "version", create_time as "createTime",

choose.otherwise: id as "id", name as "name", weight as "weight", info as "info", version as "version", create_time as "createTime",

when.test: inParams != null and inParams.id != null and inParams.id.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.name != null and inParams.name.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.weight != null and inParams.weight.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.info != null and inParams.info.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.version != null and inParams.version.size() > 0
inParams != null and inParams.createTime != null and inParams.createTime.size() > 0
